title: [转][1.7.2+]暴风雨的天空 Tempest Sky
author: hzy5548
txt_content:
来自9minecraft的一个纯观赏性地图----- Tempest Sky
简介（英文）（我知道没人看）：
A Pandora’s Blocks Production.  Tempest skies, eternal storms and obliterating maelstroms. This monumental structure serves to worship the old gods for the few that still have faith. The significance of its placement had not been a choice of the people, but of the gods, as a test to prove their loyalty.


简介（中文）：无——为了让你们看不到这些断断续续的文字，我好心去掉了→ _→
